Articles.Content: Finally done making my new station after pulling an all-nighter. This is Tummanost Station, ready to provide interplanetary vessels with fuel and supplies, as well as offering the kerbalnauts returning from missions a place to prepare for their eventual returns to Kerbin. Docked to it at the moment are two Trevoga-class orbital service vessels and a single Sozvesdiye-class SSTO. Maximum rated occupancy is 20 kerbals, but the standard crew compliment is eight.

That looks really neat! Love the orange talk battery on top.

Could you list which mods and part packs you used?

The significant mods used are B9 Aerospace for the Sozvesdiye, the WIP Inflatable Habs for the inflatable section and the two rings, and Near Future Propulsion Pack for the solar panels on both the station and the crafts. The giant fuel tank comes from Tri-Hexagonal pack.
